Package cz.cuni.mff.souradat.spellcheck.lexicon

Class WordAlternator

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.souradat.spellcheck.lexicon.WordAlternator
public class WordAlternator extends Object
Class for creating all possible alternations of a word. The allowed operations are deletion/insertion of a character and replacement of one character by another one.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Set<Character>
    defaultAlphabet
    The default Czech alphabet to be used for alternations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Stream<String>
    alternated(String word)
    Generates all words that can be created from the given word, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the default alphabet
    static Stream<String>
    alternated(String word, int upToDistance)
    Generates all words that can be created from the given word, whose distance from the given word is at most `upToDistance`, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the default alphabet

    alternated(String word, int upToDistance, Set<Character> alphabet)
    Generates all words that can be created from the given word, whose distance from the given word is at most `upToDistance`, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the given alphabet

      public static Stream<String> alternated(String word)
      Generates all words that can be created from the given word, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the default alphabet
      Parameters:
      word - : word to be alternated.
      Returns:
      infinite stream of unique alternations

    • alternated

      public static Stream<String> alternated(String word, int upToDistance)
      Generates all words that can be created from the given word, whose distance from the given word is at most `upToDistance`, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the default alphabet
      Parameters:
      word - : word to be alternated.
      upToDistance - : maximal Levenshtein distance of the alteration from the initial word
      Returns:
      finite stream of unique alternations

    • alternated

      public static Stream<String> alternated(String word, int upToDistance, Set<Character> alphabet)
      Generates all words that can be created from the given word, whose distance from the given word is at most `upToDistance`, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the given alphabet
      Parameters:
      word - : word to be alternated.
      upToDistance - maximal Levenshtein distance of the alteration from the initial word
      alphabet - : the given alphabet
      Returns:
      finite stream of unique alternations

    • alternated

      public static Stream<String> alternated(String word, Set<Character> alphabet)
      Generates all words that can be created from the given word, ordered by increasing Levehnstein distance of the generated word and the given word, using the given alphabet
      Parameters:
      word - : word to be alternated.
      alphabet - : the alphabet to be used for the alternations
